abstract: The board of Exco Resources says it is considering a buyout offer made by Douglas H. Miller, the company’s chief executive, which values the oil and gas producer at $4.35 billion.
snippet: The board of Exco Resources says it is considering a buyout offer made by Douglas H. Miller, the company’s chief executive, which values the oil and gas producer at $4.35 billion.
lead_paragraph: The board of Exco Resources, an oil and gas producer based in Dallas, said on Thursday  that it was considering a buyout offer made by Douglas H. Miller, the company’s chief executive officer, which values Exco at $4.35 billion.

headline.main: Exco Board Weighs Chief’s Buyout Offer
